summary: A follower made using my "pink seduction" racemenu preset.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89332/89332-1517552791-1435639119.jpeg[/img]﻿

[color=#00ff00]Hello all! This is my follower "Roxy," She was made using my [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89332]"Pink Seduction" RaceMenu preset[/url] and uses my BodySlide presets![/color]

[color=#00ff00][size=4][b]Huge thanks to Asherz2Ashes for doing the creation kit work to make her a follower![/b][/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][b][u]Race[/u]: [/b]Nord,[b][u] height[/u]: 0[/b].90, [b][u]weight:[/u][/b] 0, [b][u]voice[/u][/b]: FemaleYoungEager, [b][u]combat[/u][/b]: OneHand, TwoHand, LightArmor. [u]Location[/u]: The Winking Skeever in Solitude.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]If you want to change her weight, do the following:
[/color][list=1]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Open console, click on her. And for example type this: setnpcweight  50[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]this will set her at 50 weight, but her face will get messed up. Now you Disable her by typing "Disable" into console (without quotes).[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Now you type "Enable" (without quotes) into the console and she should be fixed and at your desired weight![/size][/color]
[/list][size=3]
[b][color=#00ff00][i]She is located in the Winking Skeever of Solitude.[/i][/color][/b]

[b]I HIGHLY RECOMMEND GETTING: [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/]Ultimate Follower Overhaul (UFO).[/url][/size][size=3]
[color=#00ff00]There are 2 files because she comes with 2 different UUNP presets I have made. You can follow the links to see the bodies. There is an image on this file showing the two body types as well.
[/color][/size][list=1]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Roxy with [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89301]0-Gravity[/url]﻿ Body.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Roxy with [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88480]Sweet Heart[/url]﻿ Body.[/size][/color]
[/list]
[color=#00ffff][b]Installation[/b]: Just like normal.

[b]Requirements[/b]: Dawngaurd, Dragonborn, xpmse, hdt physics extension, netimmerseoverride (included in RaceMenu mod)[/color]

[color=#b4a7d6][i][b]Credits:[/b]

[*][color=#b4a7d6][i]The Eyes of Aber[/i][/color]

author: wnisewond and Ashes2Asherz
